1.heading: Pa.
1.title: "Drones Don't Sting"
1.author: by Cliff Sterrett.
notes: Summary: Pa likes honey, but doesn't like bee stings.

2.heading: Pa.
2.title: "How Does One Recognize the Hon. Queen?"
2.author: by Cliff Sterrett.
notes: Summary: Pa is hunting for the queen bee with a flyswatter.

3.heading: Pa.
3.title: "I Hope Unk Won't Disapprove of Polly's Bee Hive"
3.author: by Cliff Sterrett.
notes: Summary: Pa Learns about the bee hive by tapping on it with his cane.

4.heading: Pa.
4.title: "I'll Just Close the Key Hole in Case They Attempt to Return"
4.author: by Cliff Sterrett.
notes: Summary: Pa doesn't like having the bee hive in the house.

5.heading: Pa.
5.title: "I've Decided to Spare 'Em"
5.author: by Cliff Sterrett.
notes: Summary: Pa gets set to burn the bees, then changes his mind.

Funny horror genre, takes place in Hell.
